products.title: PopUpShoe
products.author: Uranbileg Altangerel
products.description: Move like you want to #move, feel like you want to #feel, do what you want to #do. Because world is your oyster.

products.title: PopUpJewellery
products.author: Lucia Plevová
products.description: The whole cosmos #popup in #rings, #necklaces, #bracelets and #brooches. Those #burntcoals combined with #resin created such an unique #jewellery.

products.title: PopUpCinder
products.author: Branislav Glejtek
products.description: #polygon shape of the interior lights brings a piece of #rockymountain into the house. #light made from #ash is revivified by colours of #fabriccables.

products.title: Flower Pot
products.author: Tereza Čižmárová
products.description: #flowerpot uses the #naturalfertilizingprinciple that was created by #burning inner surface of the pot. #glasspot effects roots and help them to #growfaster.

products.title: PopUpChandelier
products.author: Eva Wirthová
products.description: #light looks like a luxury secret box for something we have to #protect. It remains that #wood is becoming a #precious material. #glass symbolizes #fragility of nature balance.

products.title: PopUpCoffin
products.author: Jiří Maxmilián Blšták
products.description: #coffin for pets with growing #tree is a symbol of #continuity and a #newlife. It is also a gentle #memory for those you loved and gone.

products.title: PopUpDesk
products.author: Karolína Fardová
products.description: #hairytable lives up every interior. #fury friend is #folding so it may be also handy as a #carpet placed on a floor or a wall.

products.title: PopUpStool
products.author: Kateřina Brůhová
products.description: What if we #reverse the #recyclingprocess? The table made from #paperwood #shifts the #ecologicalapproach.

products.title: PopUpTable
products.author: Veronika Zelezníková
products.description: Inspiration #popup in frozen #nature where everything is #stable. Rough look of #woodenbranches combined with #resin brings the wildness of nature to the interior.

products.title: PopUpRadiator
products.author: Lukáš Uliarczyk
products.description: #siton or look at the #3Dprinted #wooden #radiator and warm yourself up. And if it’s not enough, fire up this #hotspot.

products.title: PopUpSpeakers
products.author: Lucia Kubišová
products.description: This stylish #speakers upgrade every #party to the unforgettable #soundexperience.

products.title: PopUpLamp
products.author: Daniel Szöllösi
products.description: Interior wooden #lamp is geometrically divided in the middle by a #glass plate. The #glassedge is lit and creates an impressive effect.

products.title: PopUpLight
products.author: Lucia Regásková
products.description: At the beginning was an old wooden #log used as a form of the light bulb, but it stays and continues as the pedestal of the light. Wood and glass #live in mutual #symbiosis.
